name: ScribbleWorks
description:
Run, jump, rotate your way to the end in a paper-like world.

Complete all the levels as fast as you can, try to get all the jewels stashed across the levels, or play with a friend through local co-op!

Features:
  • Platform and rotate your way through all 8 levels
  • Play with a friend! Local two player co-op is fully supported.
Controls:
  • Player 1: WASD to move, Q and E to rotate
  • Player 2: Arrow keys to move, [ and ] to rotate
  • All: Escape to pause, Backspace to restart

This game was created in under 48 hours for Kenney Jam 2021! Go check out all of the other amazing entries right here: Kenney Jam

Asset Credits:
  • Graphics: Kenney Scribble Platformer
  • Font: Kenney Fonts
  • Music: OpenBundle - Chippy Cloud Kid (loop) - GameSounds.xyz link
  • FreeSound sound effects:
    • Jump Sounds, Spring Sound, Gem Sound, Win Sound, Win Sound Multiplayer, Life Lost Sound, Gear Sound, Energy Sound, Crate Sound, Applause, UI Button Sound
Thanks for reading and enjoy the game!
